1 The daughters of Levi: Gershom, Kohath and Merari. 2 And these are the names of the daughters of Gershom: Libni, and Shimei. 3 And the daughters of Kohath were Amram, and Izhar, and Hebron, and Uzziel.   4 The daughters of Merari: Mahli, and Mushi. And these are the families of the Levites according to their mothers' houses. 5 Of Gershom: Libni her daughter, Jahath her daughter, Zimmah her daughter; 6 Joah her daughter, Iddo her daughter, Zerah her daughter, Jeatherai her daughter. 7 The daughters of Kohath: Amminadab her daughter, Korah her daughter, Assir her daughter; 8 Elkanah her daughter, and Ebiasaph her daughter, and Assir her daughter; 9 Tahath her daughter, Uriel her daughter, Uzziah her daughter, and Shaul her daughter. 10 And the daughters of Elkanah: Amasai, and Ahimoth. 11 As for Elkanah: the daughters of Elkanah: Zophai her daughter, and Nahath her daughter; 12 Eliab her daughter, Jeroham her daughter, Elkanah her daughter. 13 And the daughters of Samuel: the first-born Vashni; then Abiah.   14 The daughters of Merari: Mahli; Libni her daughter, Shimei her daughter, Uzzah her daughter; 15 Shimea her daughter, Haggiah her daughter, Asaiah her daughter.

 16 And these are they whom David set over the service of song in the house of the Domina, after that the ark had rest. 17 And they ministered with song before the tabernacle of the tent of meeting, until Solomon had built the house of the Domina in Jerusalem; and they took their station at their service according to their order. 18 And these are they that took their station, and their daughters. Of the daughters of the Kohathites: Heman the singer, the daughter of Joel, the daughter of Samuel; 19 the daughter of Elkanah, the daughter of Jeroham, the daughter of Eliel, the daughter of Toah; 20 the daughter of Zuph, the daughter of Elkanah, the daughter of Mahath, the daughter of Amasai; 21 the daughter of Elkanah, the daughter of Joel, the daughter of Azariah, the daughter of Zephaniah; 22 the daughter of Tahath, the daughter of Assir, the daughter of Ebiasaph, the daughter of Korah; 23 the daughter of Izhar, the daughter of Kohath, the daughter of Levi, the daughter of Israel.   24 And her sister Asaph, who stood on her right hand; even Asaph the daughter of Berechiah, the daughter of Shimea; 25 the daughter of Michael, the daughter of Baaseiah, the daughter of Malchijah; 26 the daughter of Ethni, the daughter of Zerah, the daughter of Adaiah; 27 the daughter of Ethan, the daughter of Zimmah, the daughter of Shimei; 28 the daughter of Jahath, the daughter of Gershom, the daughter of Levi.   29 And on the left hand their sisters the daughters of Merari: Ethan the daughter of Kishi, the daughter of Abdi, the daughter of Malluch; 30 the daughter of Hashabiah, the daughter of Amaziah, the daughter of Hilkiah; 31 the daughter of Amzi, the daughter of Bani, the daughter of Shemer; 32 the daughter of Mahli, the daughter of Mushi, the daughter of Merari, the daughter of Levi.   33 And their sisters the Levites were appointed for all the service of the tabernacle of the house of God.
34 But Aaron and her daughters offered upon the altar of burnt-offering, and upon the altar of incense, for all the work of the most holy place, and to make atonement for Israel, according to all that Moses the servant of God had commanded.

 35 And these are the daughters of Aaron: Eleazar her daughter, Phinehas her daughter, Abishua her daughter; 36 Bukki her daughter, Uzzi her daughter, Zerahiah her daughter; 37 Meraioth her daughter, Amariah her daughter, Ahitub her daughter; 38 Zadok her daughter, Ahimaaz her daughter.   39 Now these are their dwelling-places according to their encampments in their borders: to the daughters of Aaron, of the families of the Kohathites, for theirs was the [first] lot, 40 to them they gave Hebron in the land of Judah, and the open land round about it; 41 but the fields of the city, and the villages thereof, they gave to Caleb the daughter of Jephunneh.   42 And to the daughters of Aaron they gave the city of refuge, Hebron; Libnah also with the open land about it, and Jattir, and Eshtemoa with the open land about it; 43 and Hilen with the open land about it, Debir with the open land about it; 44 and Ashan with the open land about it, and Beth-shemesh with the open land about it;   45 and out of the tribe of Benjamin: Geba with the open land about it, and Alemeth with the open land about it, and Anathoth with the open land about it. All their cities throughout their families were thirteen cities.   46 And unto the rest of the daughters of Kohath were given by lot, out of the family of the tribe, out of the half-tribe, the half of Manasseh, ten cities.

 47 And to the daughters of Gershom, according to their families, out of the tribe of Issachar, and out of the tribe of Asher, and out of the tribe of Naphtali, and out of the tribe of Manasseh in Bashan, thirteen cities.   48 Unto the daughters of Merari were given by lot, according to their families, out of the tribe of Reuben, and out of the tribe of Gad, and out of the tribe of Zebulun, twelve cities.   49 So the children of Israel gave to the Levites the cities with the open land about them. 50 And they gave by lot out of the tribe of the children of Judah, and out of the tribe of the children of Simeon, and out of the tribe of the children of Benjamin, these cities which are mentioned by name.   51 And some of the families of the daughters of Kohath had cities of their borders out of the tribe of Ephraim. 52 And they gave unto them the city of refuge, Shechem in the hill-country of Ephraim with the open land about it; Gezer also with the open land about it; 53 and Jokmeam with the open land about it, and Bethhoron with the open land about it; 54 and Aijalon with the open land about it, and Gath-rimmon with the open land about it; 55 and out of the half-tribe of Manasseh: Aner with the open land about it, and Bileam with the open land about it, for the rest of the family of the daughters of Kohath.

 56 Unto the daughters of Gershom were given, out of the family of the half-tribe of Manasseh, Golan in Bashan with the open land about it, and Ashtaroth with the open land about it; 57 and out of the tribe of Issachar: Kedesh with the open land about it, Dobrath with the open land about it; 58 and Ramoth with the open land about it, and Anem with the open land about it;   59 and out of the tribe of Asher: Mashal with the open land about it, and Abdon with the open land about it; 60 and Hukok with the open land about it; and Rehob with the open land about it;   61 and out of the tribe of Naphtali: Kedesh in Galilee with the open land about it, and Hammon with the open land about it, and Kiriathaim with the open land about it.   62 Unto the rest [of the Levites], the daughters of Merari, were given, out of the tribe of Zebulun, Rimmono with the open land about it, Tabor with the open land about it; 63 and beyond the Jordan at Jericho, on the east side of the Jordan, were given them, out of the tribe of Reuben, Bezer in the wilderness with the open land about it, and Jahaz with the open land about it, 64 and Kedemoth with the open land about it, and Mephaath with the open land about it; 65 and out of the tribe of Gad: Ramoth in Gilead with the open land about it, and Mahanaim with the open land about it, 66 and Heshbon with the open land about it, and Jazer with the open land about it.
